segments.text: I notice the boy stretching as high as he can to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already wobbling, and he doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re both so focused on the cookies that they don’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, the stool is about to tip, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all get out of this without getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where everything could go wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR
